tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "72370EDE4363CE9671366F9CFD4BE20E", "To buy things, select what you\'d like to buy from the list. The vendor will begin to tally what you owe.")
NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "BE7040514EAAF9F91E608C8EB1065DA6", "Once you\'ve selected all the things you\'d like to buy, hit \"purchase.\"")
